transcript:
[07:45] Child: My tummy hurts again…
[07:47] Caregiver: Oh no, sweetie. Remember the doctor said we take your medicine when that happens.
[07:51] Child: I don't like the taste.
[07:53] Caregiver: I know it’s icky, but it helps the pain go away. Let’s take one spoon together and then we can sip some juice.
[07:59] Child: Okay…
[08:02] Caregiver: Good job! Now come cuddle on the couch; we’ll read your favorite book while the medicine works.
justification: The caregiver shows understanding and support while addressing the child's concerns about taking medicine.
